project.description: Assignment ---------- Kunal wants to take a break. He likes travelling and wants to explore Istanbul this winter. Can you help him plan his itinerary? Kunal is interested in historical places - museums, palaces, etc. Kindly curate 10 such POIs within Istanbul that Kunal can visit. In order to find such POIs, please use MapBox's Search API https://docs.mapbox.com/api/search/#geocoding. Write an API to provide this list of POIs in JSON. The response format should be: GET /itinerary [ { "name": "Topkapi Palace", "categories": ["tourism", "museum"], "region": "Fatih" } ]
